Sentencas: In the studies of solid oxide carbonate composite fuel cell, percolation behaviour of the two phases was investigated as a function of particle size of the oxide phase.
Titulo: Solid oxide carbonate composite fuel cells: Size effect on percolation

Sentencas: The ratio of amount of samarium doped ceria (SDC; Sm0.2Ce0.8O) to Na2CO3 was varied to determine an optimum ionic conductivity as function of oxide particle size.
Titulo: Solid oxide carbonate composite fuel cells: Size effect on percolation

Sentencas: The roles of both phases in the composite electrolyte were investigated.
Titulo: Solid oxide carbonate composite fuel cells: Size effect on percolation

Sentencas: SDC particles were mixed in different amounts of Na2CO3 to obtain composites with carbonate ratios from 1 wt% to 50 wt%.
Titulo: Solid oxide carbonate composite fuel cells: Size effect on percolation

Sentencas: Micro-structural investigations showed that Na2CO3 phase served as the matrix in the micro-structure gluing the oxide particles together.
Titulo: Solid oxide carbonate composite fuel cells: Size effect on percolation

Sentencas: The lowest and the highest carbonate ratios caused low conductivities in the composite as in these samples the 3D connectivity of both phases were disrupted.
Titulo: Solid oxide carbonate composite fuel cells: Size effect on percolation

Sentencas: Low conductivity at both ends of the mixture composition could be interpreted as none of the components of the composite dominated the ionic conductivity.
Titulo: Solid oxide carbonate composite fuel cells: Size effect on percolation

Sentencas: The highest conductivity was obtained at 10 wt% Na2CO3 amount in the composite electrolyte when nano-sized SDC (5-10 nm) oxide powders were used.
Titulo: Solid oxide carbonate composite fuel cells: Size effect on percolation

Sentencas: Two different particle sizes of SDC powders were used to show that the optimum phase ratio, i.e. percolation of both phases, is function of particle size as well.
Titulo: Solid oxide carbonate composite fuel cells: Size effect on percolation

Sentencas: The conductivity in the composite showed percolation behaviour with respect to the two constituent phases.
Titulo: Solid oxide carbonate composite fuel cells: Size effect on percolation
